entry.title: Readings on digital objects: An annotated URIography
entry.summary: I have a long list of articles to read on digital objects, how to model them etc. This page is for keeping track of my progress

div.p: Many hours searching for articles on digital objects, and how to model, store and deliver them. This entry is for measuring my progress.
The articles are grouped with respect to the theme I feel they belong.

ul.li:
digital object store
Robert Kahn, Robert Wilensky, 2006. A framework for distributed digital object services
Carl Lagoze, Sandy Payette, Edwin Shin and Chris Wilper, 2005. Fedora: an architecture for complex objects and their relationships.

the theory of text & text modelling
Dino Buzzetti, 2002. Digital Representation and the Text Model.
Helena Francke, 2008. Towards an Architectural Document Analysis

Navigation & annotation
M. Nottingham & R. Sayre, 2005. The Atom Syndication Format
J. Snell, 2006. Atom Threading Extensions

reading habits
Nicholas Carr, 2008. Is Google Making Us Stupid? What the Internet is doing to our brains.
